mapper.select: SELECT ID,OPTYPENUM,RECYEAR,RECNUM,STARTTIME,ENDTIME,RENT,REMARK,OPRATIONID,CREATETIME FROM HOUSINGSUBSIDY WHERE OPTYPENUM=#{optypenum} AND RECYEAR=#{recyear} AND RECNUM=#{recnum} AND RELIEVETIME IS NULL

SELECT * FROM (SELECT c.*,ROWNUM RN from (SELECT a.OWNERNAME AS name,a.TELCODE AS telphone,a.OWNERCERTNUM AS idCard,a.optypenum AS optypenum,a.recyear AS recyear,a.recnum AS recnum,count(*)over()total FROM (SELECT optypenum,recyear,recnum FROM HOUSINGSUBSIDY GROUP BY optypenum,recyear,recnum) b,RWRECOWNER a WHERE
instr(a.OWNERNAME||'-'||a.TELCODE||'-'||a.OWNERCERTNUM,#{name})>0 AND
a.optypenum = b.optypenum AND a.recyear=b.recyear AND a.recnum = b.recnum ORDER BY a.recnum DESC)c where 15>=ROWNUM) WHERE RN>=0

SELECT h.optypenum AS optypenum,h.recyear AS recyear,h.recnum AS recnum,OWNERNAME AS name,OWNERCERTNUM AS idCard,TELCODE AS telphone,RENT AS rent, STARTTIME AS startTime,ENDTIME AS endTime,REMARK AS remark,(select name from sys_user where id=OPRATIONID) AS oprationName,RELIEVETIME AS relieveTime, (select name from sys_user where id=RELIEVEOPRATIONID) AS relieveOprationName FROM (SELECT optypenum,recyear,recnum,OWNERNAME,OWNERCERTNUMï¼ŒTELCODE from RWRECOWNER WHERE optypenum=#{optypenum} AND recyear=#{recyear} AND recnum=#{recnum})o,HOUSINGSUBSIDY h WHERE o.optypenum=h.optypenum AND o.recyear=h.recyear AND o.recnum=h.recnum ORDER BY RELIEVETIME DESC,ENDTIME DESC
